headline: Broadridge Schedules Webcast and Conference Call to Review Third Quarter Fiscal Year 2025 Results on May 1, 2025
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR) is scheduled to release its financial results for the third quarter of fiscal year 2025 on Thursday, May 1, 2025. Broadridge will host a webcast and conference call to discuss those results at 8:30 a.m. ET on May 1, 2025. Tim Gokey, Chief Executive Officer, and Ashima Ghei, Chief Financial Officer, will participate on the call.

headline: Banks gear up to boost cybersecurity, cloud and data spending
summary: In the race to scale generative AI capabilities, executives plan to increase foundational technology investments, according to Broadridge.
